data.name: Overbowed
data.detailed_description:
The kingdom on the sea was once peaceful. But magic has since taken over the land, and only fools or followers of the Dark Sorcerer remain among the ruins. You arrive somewhat forgetful, but your purpose is clear: explore the once thriving kingdom, and fight your way past the servants of dark magic!



Equipped with a magic bow, in Overbowed you'll explore ruins and the dangerous foes that inhabit them. This Game Boy inspired game features a vast interconnected world, collectible items, fluid combat and platforming, and more! Controller support makes for a responsive and engaging gameplay experience.



Your journey will take you through derelict city ruins, overgrown caverns, flooded dungeons, and other perilous paths. Much has changed since you disappeared. However, the past will only become clearer the deeper you travel into these dark places. Uncover the kingdom's secrets in Overbowed.

data.short_description: Explore a kingdom overrun by evil magic as you fight foes with your own magical bow.
